name: Trakt Enhanced
description: Trakt Enhanced is a web application to browse your Trakt history with a beautiful UI. Features include sorting and searching for Shows, Movies, Shows to watch, and Movies to watch. Displays cards with TMDB posters cached locally, automatic refresh at startup and at regular intervals, and a fully customizable HTML UI.
author: diabolino
